user1: [user] Can you give me an overview of this MOU?

[bot] This is a Memorandum of Understanding between OpenGov, Inc. and C.O.N.T.R.A.C.T. to build a contract management system called 'REDLINED & SIGNED'. It outlines a phased rollout from October through 2027, starting with a Prototype and ending with full Transition in 2027.
user3: [user] When does the first phase start?
[bot] The Prototype phase is scheduled for October. This will be a testable application for internal testing and gathering feedback.
user4: [bot] It's between OpenGov, Inc. (a builder of cloud-based brilliance for governments) and The Center for Oversight of Negotiation, Terms, Redlines, and Clauses - abbreviated as C.O.N.T.R.A.C.T.
